com.almasb.fxgl.asset

Interface AssetLoader


  • public interface AssetLoader
    Handles all resource (asset) loading operations.

    The "assets" directory must be located in source folder ("src" by default). If you are using the Maven directory structure then under "src/main/resources/".

    Resources (assets) will be searched for in these specified directories:

    • Texture - /assets/textures/
    • Sound - /assets/sounds/
    • Music - /assets/music/
    • Text (List<String>) - /assets/text/
    • KVFile - /assets/kv/
    • Data - /assets/data/
    • Scripts - /assets/scripts/
    • Behavior Tree - /assets/ai/
    • FXML - /assets/ui/
    • CSS - /assets/ui/css/
    • Font - /assets/ui/fonts/
    • App icons - /assets/ui/icons/
    • Cursors - /assets/ui/cursors/
    • Resource bundles - /assets/properties/
    If you need to access the "raw" JavaFX objects (e.g. Image), you can use getStream(String) to obtain an InputStream and then parse into whatever resource you need.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • loadTexture

        Texture loadTexture(String name)
        Loads texture with given name from /assets/textures/. Either returns a valid texture or throws an exception in case of errors.

        Supported image formats are:

        • BMP
        • GIF
        • JPEG
        • PNG

        Parameters:
        name - texture name without the /assets/textures/, e.g. "player.png"
        Returns:
        texture
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

      • loadTexture

        Texture loadTexture(String name,
                    double width,
                    double height)
        Loads texture with given name from /assets/textures/. Then resizes it to given width and height without preserving aspect ratio. Either returns a valid texture or throws an exception in case of errors.

        Supported image formats are:

        • BMP
        • GIF
        • JPEG
        • PNG

        Parameters:
        name - texture name without the /assets/textures/, e.g. "player.png"
        width - requested width
        height - requested height
        Returns:
        texture
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

      • loadSound

        Sound loadSound(String name)
        Loads sound with given name from /assets/sounds/. Either returns a valid sound or throws an exception in case of errors.

        Supported sound format:

      • WAV
Parameters:
name - sound name without the /assets/sounds/, e.g. "explosion.wav"
Returns:
sound
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadMusic

    Music loadMusic(String name)
    Loads sound with given name from /assets/music/. Either returns a valid sound or throws an exception in case of errors.

    Supported music format:

  • MP3
Parameters:
name - music name without the /assets/music/, e.g. "background_music.mp3"
Returns:
music
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadText

    List<String> loadText(String name)
    Loads text file with given name from /assets/text/ into List where each element represents a line in the file. Either returns a valid list with lines read from the file or throws an exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - text file name without the /assets/text/, e.g. "level_0.txt"
    Returns:
    list of lines from file
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadKV

    KVFile loadKV(String name)
    Loads KVFile with given name from /assets/kv/. Either returns a valid KVFile or throws exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - KVFile name without the /assets/kv/, .e.g "settings.kv"
    Returns:
    kv file
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadScript

    String loadScript(String name)
    Loads script with given name from /assets/scripts/ as a single string. Either returns loaded string or throws exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - script file without the /assets/scripts/, e.g. "skill_heal.js"
    Returns:
    script as a String
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadResourceBundle

    ResourceBundle loadResourceBundle(String name)
    Loads resource bundle with given name from "/assets/properties/".
    Parameters:
    name - must be under "/assets/properties/", e.g. system.properties, game.properties
    Returns:
    resource bundle
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadCursorImage

    javafx.scene.image.Image loadCursorImage(String name)
    Loads cursor image with given name from /assets/ui/cursors/. Either returns a valid image or throws exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - image name without the /assets/ui/cursors/, e.g. "attack_cursor.png"
    Returns:
    cursor image
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadUI

    UI loadUI(String name,
          UIController controller)
    Loads an FXML (.fxml) file from /assets/ui/. Either returns a valid parsed UI or throws an exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - FXML file name
    controller - the controller object
    Returns:
    a UI object parsed from .fxml
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading/parsing error

  • loadCSS

    CSS loadCSS(String name)
    Loads a CSS file from /assets/ui/css/. Can be applied by calling object.getStyleSheets().add(css.getExternalForm()). Either returns ready CSS or throws exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - CSS file name without the /assets/ui/css/, e.g. "ui_button.css"
    Returns:
    css
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadFont

    FontFactory loadFont(String name)
    Loads a native JavaFX font with given name from /assets/ui/fonts/ wrapped in a FontFactory, which later can be used to produce fonts with different sizes without accessing the font file. Either returns a valid font factory or throws exception in case of errors.

    Supported font formats are:

    • TTF
    • OTF

    Parameters:
    name - font file name without the /assets/ui/fonts/, e.g. "quest_font.ttf"
    Returns:
    font factory
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadAppIcon

    javafx.scene.image.Image loadAppIcon(String name)
    Loads an app icon from /assets/ui/icons/. Either returns a valid image or throws an exception in case of errors.
    Parameters:
    name - image name without the /assets/ui/icons/, e.g. "app_icon.png"
    Returns:
    app icon image
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • loadBehaviorTree

    <T> BehaviorTree<T> loadBehaviorTree(String name)
    Loads a behavior tree from /assets/ai/. Either returns a valid behavior tree or throws an exception in case of errors.
    Type Parameters:
    T - tree type
    Parameters:
    name - tree name without the /assets/ai/, e.g. "patrol.tree"
    Returns:
    loaded and parsed behavior tree
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if asset not found or loading error

  • getStream

    InputStream getStream(String name)
    Opens a stream to resource with given name. The caller is responsible for closing the stream. Either returns a valid stream or throws an exception. This is useful for loading resources that do not fall under any asset category. Resource is anything located within the source root / resource root, whether "src/" or "resources/". The resource name must always begin with "/", e.g. "/assets/textures/player.png".
    Parameters:
    name - resource name
    Returns:
    resource stream
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if any error occurs or stream is null

  • loadFileNames

    List<String> loadFileNames(String directory)
    Loads file names from a directory. Note: directory name must be in the format "/assets/...". Returned file names are relativized to the given directory name.
    Parameters:
    directory - name of directory
    Returns:
    list of file names
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if directory does not start with "/assets/" or was not found

  • cache

    void cache()
    Pre-loads all textures / sounds / music / text / fonts and binary data from their respective folders.

  • clearCache

    void clearCache()
    Release all cached assets.
